events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the blender is broken and won’t turn on at all. Very disappointed.
System has categorized the issue as Product Defect based on the customer's mention of broken and faulty product.
Your case has been assigned to a support agent who will assist you further with the defective blender.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your blender. I’m here to help you get this resolved quickly.
Could you please confirm if there is any visible damage or scratches on the blender, and provide a photo if possible?
Yes, there is a big scratch on the side and the blender jar is cracked. I have attached photos for your reference.
Thank you for the photos. We can send you a replacement blender immediately or issue a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement, thank you for the quick response.
Your replacement blender has been shipped and should arrive within 3-5 business days. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement blender arrived safely and is working correctly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since we have not heard back, we will close this case assuming your replacement is satisfactory. Thank you for contacting support.
